description: Nicole Kidman and Zac Efron fall in love in a sharp and funny romantic comedy about family, Hollywood, and a little too much tequila.
title: Why 'A Family Affair' works so well as a Netflix romcom

description: New Yorker writer Emily Nussbaum discusses the lawsuits brought forth by the Love is Blind cast members, and reflects on how reality TV has impacted our culture. Her new book is Cue the Sun!
title: 'Love is Blind' is mired in lawsuits. What does that mean for reality TV?

description: The decision likely ensures that the case against Trump won’t be tried before the election, and then only if he is not reelected.
title: Supreme Court says Trump has absolute immunity for official acts only

description: “Potentially catastrophic wind damage is expected" in parts of the Windward Islands near the storm's core, the National Hurricane Center said.
title: Hurricane Beryl is ‘extremely dangerous’ as it brings 130 mph winds to the Caribbean

description: Noise from roads, airports and equipment like leaf blowers has been linked with serious health impacts. Decades ago, the U.S. government passed a law limiting it, but it has no teeth.
title: Why scientists who study noise pollution are calling for more regulation

description: President Biden spent the weekend after the debate doing damage control, trying to convince supporters he’s still up to the job.
title: ‘I’m going to be fighting harder,’ Biden tells donors after disastrous debate

description: Louisiana’s governor signed a controversial bill that will make his state the first to allow surgical castration for people found guilty of certain sex crimes against children.
title: What to know about Louisiana's new surgical castration law

description: Fourth of July travel is set to break records with nearly 71 million people expected to make trips over the holiday.
title: Travel tips for a Fourth of July that's set to break records

description: Olivia Cooke and Emma D’Arcy are back on our screens together once again — but this time, no one is talking about negroni sbagliatos.
title: 'House of the Dragon' Season 2, episode 3: Make it make sense

description: The far-right National Rally leaped into a strong lead in France's first round of legislative elections, pollers projected, bringing the party closer to being able to form a government in round two.
title: French voters push far-right National Rally to strong lead in first round of elections
